outline.ch:
1.BASIC CONCEPT
(i) Introduction
(ii) Flow Patterns
(iii) Basic Models
2.PRESSURE DROP
(i) Homogeneous Models
(ii) Separated Flow Models
(iii) Empirical Treatments
3.CONDENSATION
(i) Gravity Dominated
(ii) Vapor Shear Dominated
(ii) Surface Ten

(ii) Flow Patterns

textbook.ch:
"1.Collier and Thome, “Convective Boiling and Condensation” 3rd Edition, Oxford.
2.Carey, V. P., “Liquid-Vapor Phase-Change Phenomena”, Hemisphere.
3.Hsu, Y. Y., and Graham, R. W., “Transport Processes in Boiling and Two-Phase System”, Hemisphere."
textbook.en:
"1.Collier and Thome, “Convective Boiling and Condensation” 3rd Edition, Oxford.
2.Carey, V. P., “Liquid-Vapor Phase-Change Phenomena”, Hemisphere.
3.Hsu, Y. Y., and Graham, R. W., “Transport Processes in Boiling and Two-Phase System”, Hemisphere."

gradMethod.ch: 作業10%，期中考30%，期末考30%，期末報告30%

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
